title: The Great Plan: Part 1
description: Speed Racer enters his first race to win money for his family. Meanwhile, a gang of robbers are after Pops's secret plans... which he hid in the windshield of Speed's car.

title: The Great Plan: Part 2
description: Speed continues his race, and the robbers continue their attempts to capture Speed.

title: Challenge of the Masked Racer: Part 1
description: Speed's first encounter with Racer X, a mysterious masked driver who is rumored to cause car crashes whenever he races.

title: Challenge of the Masked Racer: Part 2
description: Speed Racer and Racer X participate in the Trans-Country race... as well as competitors who stoop to dirty tricks to get rid of them.

title: The Secret Engine: Part 1
description: Speed tries to help an old man find his stolen car. It turns out the car has a map to a treasure, which a criminal mastermind is prepared to get at any cost.

title: The Secret Engine: Part 2
description: Speed leads Blaggard's men to the treasure but manages to alert his family and Trixie. The stage is set for a great battle.

title: The Race Against the Mammoth Car: Part 1
description: Speed takes part in a race where any sort of car can participate. He soon faces off with a very dangerous 200-yard mammoth car.

title: The Race Against the Mammoth Car: Part 2
description: Speed and Trixie survive the Mammoth Car, but it continues its mysterious journey even beyond the racetrack. What is its secret?

title: The Most Dangerous Race: Part 1
description: Speed takes part in a mountain race, considered with its gorges and landslides to be the most dangerous race ever. It's about to live up to that reputation.

title: The Most Dangerous Race: Part 2
description: The Alpine Car Race continues, but a yawning chasm causes a major standstill. Who will risk their lives to cross over it?

title: The Most Dangerous Race: Part 3
description: It's the final lap of the Alpine Race, but Speed Racer is blinded and Racer X's legs are broken. How can they go on?

title: Race for Revenge: Part 1
description: The son of murdered racecar driver Flash Marker seeks revenge on the rival drivers who killed him.

title: Race for Revenge: Part 2
description: Speed and Trixie try to stop Flash Jr from carrying out his vengeance, but he swears to eliminate them for interfering.

title: The Desperate Desert Race: Part 1
description: Speed is forced into a duel-race in the desert with Prince Kim Jugger, the wildest driver in the world.

title: The Desperate Desert Race: Part 2
description: Speed and Kim team up together to save Kim's country of Flathill from being taken over by criminal revolutionaries.

title: The Fire Race: Part 1
description: The Inca land of Kapetepek, noted for its secrecy and treasures, hosts a race with foreign and native drivers. To ensure their land's privacy, the Kapetepekan drivers must win, at any cost.

title: The Fire Race: Part 2
description: The race in Kapetepek continues.

title: Girl Daredevil: Part 1
description: The Mach 5 team befriends Twinkle Banks, an acrobat whose family circus is being rendered bankrupt by a gang of crooks.

title: Girl Daredevil: Part 2
description: Brotch and his cronies imprison Speed and Twinke in a cave and head off to their Mt Rushmore lair. But it doesn't take long before the two escape and a major fight breaks out.

title: The Fastest Car on Earth: Part 1
description: Pops is horrified at the return of the GRX, a supernaturally powerful engine that has ended up killing or harming every one of its drivers.

title: The Fastest Car on Earth: Part 2
description: Speed is crippled with a fear of driving after one round in the GRX. Can he pull himself back together in time for his next race?

title: Mach Five vs. Mach Five: Part 1
description: Speed is framed for robbery by Mr Cumulus, who has had a duplicate Mach 5 built for his own ends.

title: Mach Five vs. Mach Five: Part 2
description: Cumulus attempts to take over the world, setting the stage for a showdown between the two Mach 5 automobiles.

title: The Royal Racer: Part 1
description: While the Racers enjoy a trip to the Eastern Kingdom of Saccharin, Spritle is mistaken for Prince Jam, heir to the throne, and the two end up swapping lives.

title: The Royal Racer: Part 2
description: Spritle and Prince Jam team up to save the Racer family and the kingdom of Saccharin.

title: The Car Hater
description: Mr Trotter, a man who hates cars ever since his son perished in an auto accident, sets out to rid the world of cars.

title: The Terrifying Gambler
description: The Mach 5 team crosses paths with Mr Fastbucks, a wanted criminal with a taste for gambling and who's rigged Speed's latest race with explosives.

title: The Race Against Time: Part 1
description: Speed and Trixie scour the Sahara for an archaeologist's daughter, and come across a fantastic kingdom.

title: The Race Against Time: Part 2
description: Speed and Trixie are made slaves and ordered to dig up treasure. But Speed has an escape and rescue plan in mind.

title: The Snake Track
description: Speed learns to master the Snake Track, a course with strategically placed curves, with the help of Rock Force, a one-armed driver.

title: The Man on the Lam
description: Speed is taken hostage by Lawson Lamster, an escaped convict searching for the money he stole before being captured. Unfortunately, Lamster's partners are right on his tail.

title: Gang of Assassins: Part 1
description: While sightseeing in Japan, the Mach 5 team crosses paths with a gang of assassins who are out to sabotage an international peace conference.

title: Gang of Assassins: Part 2
description: Speed learns to his disgust that Racer X has joined the assassins. But is it for real?

title: The Race for Life
description: The young mayor of the South American village of Tonado is dying of poison. Speed volunteers to drive to Dominic and back to get the antidote, but someone is out to stop him.

title: The Supersonic Car
description: A supersonic car built by the Racers is sabotaged and they are framed for its bad performance. Now they must work to foil the saboteurs and save their reputation.

title: Crash in the Jungle: Part 1
description: Speed heads to Nairobi for the Trans-African Grand Prix. But en route he is dumped into the jungle and must fend for himself amidst giant spiders and gargantuan gorillas.

title: Crash in the Jungle: Part 2
description: Speed, Trixie, Sprytle and Chim-Chim are captured by a ruthless dictator's jungle army who plans to take over the world.

title: The Secret Invaders: Part 1
description: The Mach 5 team come across yet another band of assassins seeking to take over the kingdoms of Ambrocia and Abalonia.

title: The Secret Invaders: Part 2
description: Speed Racer fakes his death to draw out Elegantor and his assassins.

title: The Man Behind the Mask
description: A masked maniac takes the Mach 5 team hostage and forces Speed to carry out art gallery robberies.

title: The Car Destroyer
description: Dr J.D. Crepit, a mad scientist who hates cars because his son was crippled in an auto accident, plots to destroy all the cars in the world.

title: The Desperate Racer
description: Trixie wants Speed to lose a race, so that her friend's brother will win and use the prize money to heal her. Meanwhile, a royal jewel is hidden inside a pineapple - one of many given to the competing racers.

title: The Dangerous Witness
description: Speed is asked by the Chinese Princess Pedal to be her bodyguard, as a gang of assassins have taken a job on her.

title: Race the Laser Tank
description: A gang of crooks have captured top-secret plans for a new weapon: a tank with a laser device. When Speed tries to interfere, they decide to test the tank on him.

title: The Great Car Wrestling Match
description: Speed discovers that a former racing driver Gadge Zoomer has taken to car wrestling (demolition derbies) to support his family, and attempts to get him to leave this destructive sport.

title: Motorcycle Apaches
description: A astronomical base in the Southwest is being terrorized by a band of apaches on motorcycles, and calls Speed for help.

title: Car with a Brain
description: A mad scientist brings to life a monster car that wreaks mayhem and destruction across the country. Can Speed stop it?

title: Junk Car Grand Prix
description: The Junkyard Grand Prix is hosted by a rich baron in honour of his missing daughter. But in fact she appears in the race as an unknowing competitor to Speed.

title: The Car in the Sky
description: When the Racers crash on a deserted island with no food or water, they turn the Mach 5 into a makeshift aircraft in order to go for help.

title: The Trick Race
description: Exactly a year after the Alpine Race, the Car Acrobat Team challenges Speed Racer to a race to determine the superior driver. But all is not what it seems...

title: Race Around the World: Part 1
description: Speed takes part in the most important race of his career, the Around the World Grand Prix.

title: Race Around the World: Part 2
description: Hindered by unscrupulous rivals, obstacles, and his own self, can Speed win the most important race of his career?
